name: Space Academy IV
description:
Made by a group of three university students in the UK

A light-hearted dating sim set in a modern day academy, but with a twist... Humans, Aliens, and Robots all studying in the same classroom!

You're just an ordinary student, joined by your best friend Eva! Although it seemed like it was going to be just a typical day at the academy, you end up getting yourself caught up in all sorts of crazy scenarios! Who knows what the day will bring?

(All music within the game created by Kevin Macleod)
